>
[Dire Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=2496) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Beastkin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=337" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 81 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your hybrid shape is a hulking beast. While in your hybrid shape, you gain the effects of [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102).
name: Dire Form
